00024 #ifndef __L4SYS__MEMDESC_H__
00025 #define __L4SYS__MEMDESC_H__
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/kernel.h>
00028 
00044 enum l4_mem_type_t
00045 {
00046   l4_mem_type_undefined    = 0x0, 
00047   l4_mem_type_conventional = 0x1, 
00048   l4_mem_type_reserved     = 0x2, 
00049   l4_mem_type_dedicated    = 0x3, 
00050   l4_mem_type_shared       = 0x4, 
00051 
00052   l4_mem_type_bootloader   = 0xe, 
00053   l4_mem_type_archspecific = 0xf, 
00054 };
00055 
00056 
00064 typedef struct l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t
00065 {
00067   l4_umword_t l;
00069   l4_umword_t h;
00070 } l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t;
00071 
00072 
00077 L4_INLINE
00078 l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *
00079 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_descs(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW;
00080 
00087 L4_INLINE
00088 unsigned
00089 l4_kernel_info_get_num_mem_descs(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW;
00090 
00102 L4_INLINE
00103 void
00104 l4_kernel_info_set_mem_desc(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md,
00105                             l4_addr_t start,
00106           l4_addr_t end,
00107           unsigned type,
00108           unsigned virt,
00109           unsigned sub_type) L4_NOTHROW;
00110 
00117 L4_INLINE
00118 l4_umword_t
00119 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_start(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW;
00120 
00127 L4_INLINE
00128 l4_umword_t
00129 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_end(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW;
00130 
00137 L4_INLINE
00138 l4_umword_t
00139 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_type(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW;
00140 
00150 L4_INLINE
00151 l4_umword_t
00152 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_subtype(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW;
00153 
00160 L4_INLINE
00161 l4_umword_t
00162 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_is_virtual(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW;
00163 
00164 /*************************************************************************
00165  * Implementations
00166  *************************************************************************/
00167 
00168 L4_INLINE
00169 l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *
00170 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_descs(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW
00171 {
00172   return (l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *)(((l4_addr_t)kip)
00173       + (kip->mem_info >> (sizeof(l4_umword_t) * 4)));
00174 }
00175 
00176 L4_INLINE
00177 unsigned
00178 l4_kernel_info_get_num_mem_descs(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW
00179 {
00180   return kip->mem_info & ((1UL << (sizeof(l4_umword_t)*4)) -1);
00181 }
00182 
00183 L4_INLINE
00184 void
00185 l4_kernel_info_set_mem_desc(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md,
00186                             l4_addr_t start,
00187           l4_addr_t end,
00188           unsigned type,
00189           unsigned virt,
00190           unsigned sub_type) L4_NOTHROW
00191 {
00192   md->l = (start & ~0x3ffUL) | (type & 0x0f) | ((sub_type << 4) & 0x0f0)
00193     | (virt ? 0x200 : 0x0);
00194   md->h = end;
00195 }
00196 
00197 
00198 L4_INLINE
00199 l4_umword_t
00200 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_start(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW
00201 {
00202   return md->l & ~0x3ffUL;
00203 }
00204 
00205 L4_INLINE
00206 l4_umword_t
00207 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_end(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW
00208 {
00209   return md->h | 0x3ffUL;
00210 }
00211 
00212 L4_INLINE
00213 l4_umword_t
00214 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_type(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW
00215 {
00216   return md->l & 0xf;
00217 }
00218 
00219 L4_INLINE
00220 l4_umword_t
00221 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_subtype(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW
00222 {
00223   return (md->l & 0xf0) >> 4;
00224 }
00225 
00226 L4_INLINE
00227 l4_umword_t
00228 l4_kernel_info_get_mem_desc_is_virtual(l4_kernel_info_mem_desc_t *md) L4_NOTHROW
00229 {
00230   return md->l & 0x200;
00231 }
00232 
00233 #endif /* ! __L4SYS__MEMDESC_H__ */
